flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction_rendered:
Relevant parts
  • Lens Hood
  • Carbon Fiber Sticker Sheet
Tools
  • Hair Dryer (optional)
  • Scissors
  • X-Acto Knife, a.k.a. hobby knife

lines.text: I bought a cheap ($4.00) Lens hood from DealExtreme for this experiment rather than using the expensive one from the manufacturer of my camera.
lines.text_raw: I bought a cheap ($4.00) Lens hood from [http://www.dealextreme.com|DealExtreme] for this experiment rather than using the expensive one from the manufacturer of my camera.

lines.text: You can get the Carbon Fiber sticker from your local auto parts store if you've got a very deep wallet and/or you are impatient. I got mine from eBay for 1/10th the price and a little wait. These textured stickers come in many colors, I choose basic blank.
lines.text_raw: You can get the Carbon Fiber sticker from your local auto parts store if you've got a very deep wallet and/or you are impatient. I got mine from [http://www.ebay.com|eBay] for 1/10th the price and a little wait. These textured stickers come in many colors, I choose basic blank.

lines.text: Pretty much any pair of clean, sharp scissors will work.
lines.text_raw: Pretty much any pair of clean, sharp scissors will work.

lines.text: You want your hobby knife to have a fresh, very sharp blade.
lines.text_raw: You want your hobby knife to have a fresh, very sharp blade.

lines.text: Measure the Circumference of the hood.
lines.text_raw: Measure the Circumference of the hood.

lines.text: Measure the Length of the hood.
lines.text_raw: Measure the Length of the hood.

lines.text: Measure the Diameter of the hood, both at the front and at the back.
lines.text_raw: Measure the Diameter of the hood, both at the front and at the back.

guide.summary: Add a little "high tech" look to your camera by wrap a lens hood in "Carbon Fiber".
guide.title: DIY Carbon Fiber Lens Hood
